name: Labyrinth (itch) (prof_mori)
description:
Labyrinth is a top-down shooter where two players aim to find and kill one another, aided by random drops from loot boxes. There is a wide variety of weapons to choose from, including "special weapons", such as a rocket launcher.

I would greatly appreciate any feedback I can get, and would appreciate feedback here, on itch.io, or by completing a survey.

Please post screenshot of any crashes that you experience, as this makes fixing any bugs much easier
